remarks: Negation in a group power.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2015.)
statement:
pwsgrp.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwsinvg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
pwsinvg.m $e |- M = ( invg ` R ) $.
pwsinvg.n $e |- N = ( invg ` Y ) $.
pwsinvg $p |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ I e. V /\ X e. B ) -> ( N ` X ) = ( M o. X ) ) $.
